page.title: 09Games Children Play,Preston.
page.content: There are many games children play.They can be individual or group games.Favourite individual games include,dominoes,skipping,sevensies, monopoly,cards,tennis against a wall, hopscotch,football,"wallies"and computer games.Many individual games are self created although the consumer society shows a drift from traditional and self created games to commercial products. "Sevensies" is a game in which a ball is thrown against a wall and different things are done (hand clapping etc) before it is caught. Group games include "Queenio-cokeyo" , British Bulldogs,Ghostbusters(from a popular film) Hide and Seek, Nine lives and Stuck in the mud. Many games are known in different areas of the country by different titles.
